conflicts.description: circe2: Due to severe regressions, gfortran 6.5.0 can not be used. See https://whizard.hepforge.org/compilers.html
conflicts.name: %gcc@6.5.0

conflicts.description: circe2: gfortran needs to support Fortran 2008. For more detailed information see https://whizard.hepforge.org/compilers.html
conflicts.name: %gcc@:5.0

conflicts.description: circe2: The fortran compiler needs to support Fortran 2008. For more detailed information see https://whizard.hepforge.org/compilers.html
conflicts.name: %intel@:17

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
OCaml is an industrial strength programming language supporting
functional, imperative and object-oriented styles
dependencies.name: ocaml

dependencies.description:
TeX Live is an easy (we hope) way to get up and running with the TeX
document production system. It provides a comprehensive TeX system with
binaries for most flavors of Unix, including GNU/Linux, macOS, and also
Windows. It includes all the major TeX-related programs, macro packages,
and fonts that are free software, including support for many languages
around the world.
dependencies.name: texlive

description:
Circe2 is a beam spectrum generator that provides efficient, realistic
and reproducible parametrizations of the correlated e+/e- and gamma beam
spectra for linear colliders and photon colliders.
name: circe2

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
